content: {"name": "South Philadelphia Community Fridge @ Fridges and Family", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Resource has no phone number however, email and FB is available (https://www.facebook.com/southphlcommunityfridge) and please check their website as well.", "email": "", "url": "https://southphillyfridge.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1149 South 9th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "South Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19147", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9349336, "longitude": -75.15854639999999}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "15:59"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open 24/7!
